name: Grilled Chicken Breast
description: Juicy and tender grilled chicken breast marinated in herbs and spices, served with steamed vegetables.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy fettuccine pasta tossed with grilled chicken and a rich Alfredo sauce.

description: Roast chicken seasoned with zesty lemon and aromatic herbs, accompanied by roasted potatoes.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
